dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: I'm ready. Let me take the vanguard.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Every morning, I feel as though I am newly hatched.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: It's afternoon—time for maneuver training. As for lunch, I had something simple.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Nighttime brings back memories of my selection.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
This suit...? I'm sorry, but only the Rhino Team can use this suit.
You won't be able to lift a finger without a special procedure allowing your bioelectricity to be detected by the suit, much less endure the suit's weight.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: We are vanguards of the battlefield. We defend those who work with us and disrupt the enemy lines.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
The training may appear excessively frequent... yet it is all necessary. Unforeseen deployment may happen at any time.
...Not many of them appear enthusiastic, however.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
To be frank, not many are lacking in combat experience. Joining R Corp. means that you'll soon have plenty of it, that's why...
I don't wish to recall them, however.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
Breaking and bursting myself is an awfully unpleasant experience. I do understand its necessity, however...
I hope you won't ever experience it yourself.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: This seems like a good time to do some anaerobic exercise.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Understood. I will bring you results that are as good as your support.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Deployment.

dataList.desc: Entry
dataList.dlg: Commencing... suit pressurization.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: It's not safe here.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Haah!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Their lines are broken.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Hnnh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Confirming cessation of biological activity.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Ah... must I repeat the selection process...?

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Selecting me brings success.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: I did not anticipate... this outcome.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: An adequate result. I will make up for the mistakes today with additional training.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: A flawless result. An outcome made possible by the rigorous selection process of the Hatchery.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: I lacked... combat experience... I will be sent back to the Hatchery, then...
